response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's worth sharing with you at a special introductory price. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product for $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to making such exceptional items accessible to discerning buyers like yourself. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
